Key:
Is Miku not here yet? I wonder if her class went
on long.

(It's been a few days since I started dating Miku.
She said she wanted to go somewhere after school,
and asked to meet at the front gate, but...)

Still, it hasn't sunken in for me yet. That the
girl I'm dating was actually an active idol.

(On top of that, Miku is a popular idol. Everyone
who's anyone knows her... That's just who she
is.)

(Still, I know Miku said a while ago to bring on
the press, but the more I think about it, brazenly
meeting up in a place like this might be bad...)

All right. I'll text her now. We can meet up
somewhere that's secluded and unpopulated.

Darling, sorry to keep you waiting!
It's your angel, Miku～!

Whoa, whoa! What?
Everything's gone all dark!
And there's something soft on my face!

Oh, is something wrong?
Is it possible you don't know who it is?
It's Miku, darling! ♪

Ack, wai—... For now, please let me go.
I-I'm suffocating...
Ah, I'm sorry.
*sigh...* That was so sudden. You surprised me.

Goodness, darling. It's so rude of you not
to know when it's your lovely girlfriend.

Well, if someone surprises me with a hug,
then you can't expect me to know who it is
immediately...

Even・then, a couple should be in tune
with one another!

I don't get it... Er, more importantly, Miku.
Isn't it kinda dangerous to hug me somewhere
so public?

Aww, why is that? In fact, I'd rather cling to
you because it's such a public place, darling.
As if to say, This is the love of my life～!""

Well, you're an idol, so it's better for you
to be careful.

Goodness. Are you my mother or my manager,
darling? You don't need to fuss about that!
More importantly, let's hurry on!

Ah, Miku, I'm not done talking...
I said, don't link our arms together!
They're looking! People are looking!
Come on, come on. Let's get a move-on already!
...Ahh, jeez. I guess it can't be helped.

(Sometimes, I let Miku do whatever she pleases.
After all, when she smiles so innocently like
that, no man alive would dare resist her.)

But is it really okay? Having it at my house and
all, I mean, since it's a date.

It's fiiiine. I look forward to relaxing at your
house, darling. Everyone else often goes there,
right?
Hrmmm...

Erm, they do come over, but they just eat and
leave, you know?
Hmm. Is that so? That's all, huh...? Hm.

Oogh... W-We occasionally play games
together, maybe?
Oooh. That sounds like fun.
Um, Miku, are you upset? Possibly.
I'm not upset?

There's no point in me being angry over the
fact you met others before me, you know?
Miku...? Could it be... that you're jealous?

Th-That's not true at all!
Goodness, you're such a dummy, darling!

S-Sorry! Today no one else but you will be
there, so you can stay as long as you like.

Then, can you show me... a place that none
of the others have seen before?

Huh? A place nobody else has seen?
Is that...

...You mean my room, don't you? But I don't
know if anyone's ever seen it.

It's fine. Only the girlfriend should have the
privilege of being invited into the boyfriend's
room, after all.

Well, I suppose that's true. From now on,
that's only your privilege, Miku.
Yes!

(I feel like it's not that big of a deal, but
she seems satisfied, so whatever.)

Now then, I'll go make some tea.
Go ahead and relax.
Okaaaaay. Will do.

...I'm saying this just in case, but don't go
snooping around for anything.

Ohhh. If you don't want me snooping around,
does it mean there's something you don't want
me to find?
(Oh shoot!)

Hey, darling. What don't you want me to find?
What sort of treasures are you hiding? Hm,
darling?

Just forget it! Just sit still and relax until
I come back!
But if I sit still, I can't relax.
Shut up!

*sigh* I really let that slip... Well, I trust
Miku, so I'm not anxious... or anything.

(I had a brief moment of doubt, but it was
quickly dismissed.)

Though, I know it's late, and I'm starting to get
nervous. She's come to hang out at the house.
Kotori's not back either, so it's just us two...
Ack, what am I thinking?!
Whoa... H-Hot! O-Oh. It's the phone.
Y-Yes, hello?
Oh, Shido? What's wrong? You sound out\nof breath.

O-Oh, it's nothing. I was just boiling some
water...
Hmm, that's rare. You've brought someone\nhome then, I figure.
(How does she know?! Is my sister psychic?!)
I-I haven't brought anyone over.
Ahahaha. I know that much. Someone as\nuseless as you could never do that.

(Urgh. Because I answered with a snappy
retort, I can't even say I actually have my
girlfriend over.)
Oh, the reason why I called. It doesn't\nlook like I'll be home tonight.
Huh, really?
That's the situation, so I don't need dinner.\nMake sure to lock up before bed.

What am I, a kid? I get it. Take care of
yourself, too.
Mhmm. See you.

Jeez, Kotori. Thanks for the heads up.
Well, it's fine.

Since she's here anyway, I wonder if Miku
would be happy if I invited her to dine with
me. I'll try asking her.
Alright, the tea is done, so...
Miku, can I come in...?
H-Huh? D-darling? Umm, come in?

Oh, now that I think about it, it's my room.
Well, whatever. Miku, for dinner tonight,
would you like to eat...
Wh-What are you doing?!

(Uh, what's going on here? Is this happening?
N-No, there's no way my girlfriend is naked
with only a dress shirt on!)
Ummm, does it suit me～?

Gah, this really is happening! What are you
doing, Miku?! Is that my school uniform?!

(It's the same one I changed out of when
I got home. She must have put it on while
I was making tea.)

Goodness, darling. You have yet to answer
my question, you know? Your girlfriend is
in such an immodest state, after all!
Ah, er, ummm... You're very pretty, but...

Do you... Do you really think so?
Just how pretty am I?
Like a I thought my heart was about to

Operator: drop" sort of level? In several different ways."

Key: Is that so? How lovely. Charmed, even～

I-I see. That's good.
...I mean!! What on earth are you wearing?!
If someone saw you like this...
Is there anyone else here?
No. We're alone, but...
(Wait, why am I answering so honestly?!)

There's no reason to fret. If it's just you and
I here, darling, then there's no worry about
anyone else seeing, right?

(No reason to fret? No no no. Calm down,
Shido Itsuka. Don't get caught up in the
situation.)

(I just have to be upfront with her. With total
determination. Our relationship just started,
so we can't be doing something... like this.)
Miku!
I suppose a little longer couldn't hurt?
Let's hurry and change, okay?
Have you gotten chubbier?
I-I guess a little longer couldn't hurt?

(Wait, what am I saying?! Wasn't I going to
be upfront with her?)

Hee hee hee. Oh, darling. The heart knows
what it wants. Just a little longer then, yes?
Augh!

(I-It's no good. Miku's bewitching words
practically melt my brain. I can't pull my
eyes away...)

If Miku says so, then a little longer couldn't
hurt...

No! What I'm saying is that this isn't
good. There's still daylight out. Miku,
put on some clothes!
Whaaat, but why?

Ask all you want, but I'm the one who's
confused here. What's wrong, Miku?

Umm. Could it possibly be, darling?
Have you grown tired of me?

N-No, I could never get tired of you.
I just thought this is moving a little
fast for us.

Hmm... If you say so, darling, then it can't
be helped.
...Whew.

(Thank goodness. Looks like it's cleared up
somehow.)
And here I wanted to do a favor for you...
I-I see. It's true that I appreciate that, but...
You appreciated it? Then I should...

No, I don't mean it like that. I just meant
that I appreciate the sentiment!
Very well. Then I'm happy to hear it.

But I want you to remember this～
You're the only one worthy of this
sight, darling.
I'll take it to heart.

Please do. Perhaps if you do, then I could
show you even more...

W-Waaaugh! For now, I'm going to leave the
room! Get some clothes on in the meantime.

Goodness, darling. Well, it's all part of your
charm.

Miku, maybe you should get some clothes
on... Okay?

(I had to muster everything inside of me to
ask her. Willpower, logic, you name it.)

Um, darling, could it be that you don't
like it? This sort of thing...

It's not that I don't like it, I just wondered
if something was the matter.
Huh? The matter? What do you mean?

Well, even on the way home, you seemed
lost in thought, so I wondered if there was
something on your mind. So I assumed, at least.

Guess there's no hiding anything from you,
darling.
Huh? What do you...
U-Umm. You promise not to laugh if I tell you?
Y-Yeah. I won't laugh.

I-I wanted to learn more about you, darling...
So...

You wanted to learn more about me? What does
that have to do with you being undressed?

I-It's not how it seems. I wanted to flip
through an old photoalbum of yours, but
then your uniform caught my eye.
U-Uh huh. And then?

Then, it smelled like you, and so I thought
that if I enveloped myself in your scent, I'd
understand you better, darling.

(I could hear the gears turning in my mind.
This was... possible, but really...?)
I-It's strange, isn't it? Me in this state...

I-It's not strange at all! I feel like I got to
know you a little better, too. Probably...
Really? You're not lying, are you, darling?
(Oogh. She's getting suspicious.)
C-Cross my heart.
(After saying this, I pulled Miku into my arms.)
...?! U-Um, darling?

It seems like only yesterday that we met, and
now we've started seeing each other. If there's
anything you wanna know, Miku, then I'm here.

Anything at all, Miku, even this...
E-Even my scent.
...Okay. This makes me happy, darling.

Are you satisfied now? Why don't you change,
Miku?
Wait, just a little longer...

S-Seriously? N-Not sure how much longer
I'm gonna last...

Not yet. You said you'd be here, so you need
to hold up your end of the deal.
Oogh. I understand.

(In the end, I ended up holding Miku like
that for another 30 minutes.)

Hey, Miku.
...Have you gotten a little chubbier?

(H-Huh? What the hell am I saying?
I'm so confused that I'm losing my mind.)

Um, darling? What did you say just now?
I couldn't hear you very well.

Er, ah, well, I just thought that compared to
how I've seen you on TV, you look a little
fluffier.

A little fluffier? How strange. I could have
sworn you said something different just a
second ago, didn't you?

I-Is that so? You must have misheard me.
Ahahaha...

How peculiar. So are you saying that the me you
see on TV is more attractive than in reality?
N-No, that's not what I meant at all!

Isn't that strange? There's no possible way
that everyone's favorite idol, Miku Izayoi,
could possibly get chubby.
That is positively bizarre, darling.
Eeek!

(Ahhh. Why did I say such a thing? A demon
must've made me say it. That must be it.)

I think, darling, because of that wicked
thing you said, you're in need of a little
punishment.

Y-You've got it wrong, Miku.
Please, please listen to me!
It's all wroooong!

(There are some things that, once said, can
never be taken back. That proved to be my
lesson for the day.)

(And so, after all the fuss, Miku and I ended
up having dinner together. Miku helped a bit
with the cooking as well.)

Good grief. I was wondering why you wanted
to come to my house all of a sudden. Please,
from now on, no funny business like that.
Hee hee. Okaaaay.
You sure you understand...? Sheesh.

I absolutely do understand. What a treat it
was to spend the day at your house, darling.
Some of this, a bit of that, and you-know-what.

Augh! Just drop that already! Come on. If
we don't eat now, it'll get cold.
Darling, won't you say, "aaah"～?
P-Please just give it a rest!

Whaaaat? Guess it can't be helped. Then
you owe me one next time, okay?

Got it... Whatever my girlfriend asks of me,
after all.
As expected of darling, I love you.
Y-Yeah.

(Looks like Miku's got her hold on me from
now on.)
